alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 12:58AM AKST until January 30 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations up to 2 inches. Winds gusting to 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 55 below. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Wind chills as low 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility in blowing snow is expected from late this morning into this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
